title: Alt + Tabbing causes League of Legends to freeze in fullscreen (while in game and in loading screen)
body:
Sometimes you just have to alt + tab for something important, but this just happened to me now after the 7.8 patch update. I've disabled all windows 10 update features such as GameDVR, GameBar etc. Anything to do to fix this?

Notes:
I've figured out that enabling "Show Game bar when I play full screen games Microsoft has verified" fixes this issue, but this would lock my FPS to 60 on every game which I don't want. Can anyone fix this issue that relates to this Microsoft feature?

replies.body: Have you tried running League of Legends in Windowed Borderless, located in your settings? Let me know if performance improves.

Alt tabbing in Loading isn't recommended unless you are using Windowed/Borderless since you're basically telling your PC to not do the thing and it can cause problems. For in game alt tabbing to be affected though is rather strange.

Switch to borderless/windowed and see if that fixes it. If it doesn't, trying turning on Low Spec Mode and Close Client During Game in the client settings.

If that fails, submit a support ticket (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the details of the problem.
